remarks: Finite support of univariate polynomial coefficient vectors. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Mar-2015.)  (Revised by AV, 19-Jul-2019.)
statement:
coe1sfi.a $e |- A = ( coe1 ` F ) $.
coe1sfi.b $e |- B = ( Base ` P ) $.
coe1sfi.p $e |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) $.
coe1sfi.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` R ) $.
coe1sfi $p |- ( F e. B -> A finSupp .0. ) $.
